content: Bank Account DBS Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 Aug 2019How do I close my DBS/POSB bank account online?2 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Huang Yixuan, Product Designer at SeedlyLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 16 Aug 2019Hi! I've just closed my account recently, here's what you can do:Log in to DBS ibanking on your desktop.Under Request, select More Requests.Find the section Other Services, and select Close Deposit Account.Authenticate with your digital token.Select the account you wish to close. Do note that in order to close an account, you need to first transfer out remaining funds in the account, if not you will not be able to proceed!Check to make sure you got the information right and click the submit button.*Do note that all ATM and debit card tagged to the account will be automatically cancelled when account closure is processed!0 comments0

Ginny YunLevel 1. FreshieAnswered on 16 Aug 2019If is DBS/POSB Deposit account, you can refer to the link below
